column4: when creating partitions, does it matter what order they go in? (I will need /,/home,/data (FAT32), and /swap)
when creating partitions, does it matter what order they go in? (I will need /,/home,/data (FAT32), and /swap)
not terribly.  Usually /boot and / are the first two, then swap then the rest.
you can only have 4 primary partitions (I usually use them for /boot and /) but you can have a lot of logical partitions
